metadata.name: Nostalgic Memory #1 "Tomorrow"
metadata.description:
Through this series "Nostalgic Memory",I want to draw "One scene of one's spring of life".
I hope you feel nostalgic and it make you get peace of mind.

(My vision)
In Most kind of creative industry in Japan,â€¦for example animation,social network game,light novels and so on,
"Character illustration" is the main priority and "Landscape illustration" is a secondary priority.

Compared to Character illustration,Landscape illustration is still not very popular in Japan.
So it don't have many opportunities to be in the spotlight.

However there is a lot of excellence landscape art.
NFT has so much potential to realize "The future where all kinds of illustrations can be in the spotlight".

Now,in Japan, NFT except Character illustration is not very popular yet.

So by continuing to make "Landscape illustration",I want to contribute in realizing that future and development of "Landscape illustration".

I hope the world where all kinds of illustrations can bright.
